ValidationRule.description: This validation rule will restrict changes from UI in fields coming from integration.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( ISBLANK(Source_System_ID__c) ) && ( ISCHANGED( Line_Type__c ) || ISCHANGED( Account__c ) || ISCHANGED( PHN__c ) || ISCHANGED( Date_of_Service__c ) || ISCHANGED( Import_Date__c ) || ISCHANGED( Location_Responded__c ) || ISCHANGED( Site_Code__c ) || ISCHANGED( Facility__c ) || ISCHANGED( Fixed_Wing_Helicopter__c ) || ISCHANGED( Cost__c ) || ISCHANGED( Sub_Total__c ) || ISCHANGED( Basic_Amount__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Record Created from External system can not be updated.
